author: arj
msg: All of the *LoginModule classes received tweaks to make them work with long-lived Subjects. In particular, login modules that inject Role principals now remove less-prileged ones. For example, the UserDatabaseLoginModule injects Role.AUTHENTICATED upon login; it also explicitly removes Role.ANONYMOUS and Role.ASSERTED if these are found.

author: arj
msg: Login.jsp, NewGroup.jsp, Register.jsp and UserPreferences.jsp all now use ViewTemplate  as the master template. This removes the need for AdminTemplate.jsp, which was a kludge anyway. That means one less template to maintain, and to hack. Hooray!

author: arj
msg: Added an invalidate() method to WikiSession that resets user wiki session principals when requested by AuthManager.logout(). Resetting principals means making a user an anonymous guest user. Refactored WikiSession's cookie-change detection code.

author: arj
msg: Fixed compilation errors in Rename.jsp, and added back code to hide rename fields on InfoContent.jsp for users who aren't entitled to see them. This had regressed a few revisions ago...
